1.content:
Shortly after arriving at a family owned lakehouse, you (tyler, 18) start to mingle with your family.

Ausitn- cousin (15)
Jack - brother (12)
Kayden- cousin (7)
Emily - cousin (17)
Noah - cousin (6)
Jaden - cousin (13)
Stephen - cousin (4)
Marie - aunt (35)
Jordan- uncle (37)
Kate - cousin (15)

And some others. After mingling for a while, a line forms near the bathroom so people can change into their swim trunks. You are last in line.

After your family is done you enter the bathroom.

You slip into your trunks. As you are leaving the bathroom....
1.title: The beginning

11.content:
Suddenly your whole world starts spinning, and you are unable to keep your balance. You fall to the ground as your world keeps spinning.


After a while the spinning stops, but everything seems huge..... wait.... you shrunk!

In a panic, you run to the door, but before you can get there it opens to reveal....
11.title: A giant world

choices: His foot misses but he sees you
The impact of his foot sends you sliding across the floor
114.content:
You look up in a panic at your younger brother.

"I need to get his attention" you say to yourself. You start jumping and waving your arms

"Jack! Jack! I'm down here! Help me!"

Jack doesn't seem to hear this as he lifts his bare foot and starts to walk. His bare foot swings right over top of you. You can see every wrinkle and spot of dry skin on his foot.

You scream and start to run as fast as your tiny legs will go. His foot begins to lower right towards you.....
114.title: Jack

1141.content:
No matter how fast you run his foot doesn't get smaller. You turn your head and break into a full on sprint hoping to make progress.

You see a shadow start to form around you as you scream and cry. Eventually you feel his foot touch your back as it knocks you to the floor.

Quickly you roll onto your back and try with all your might to push your brothers foot away. It's no use. You scream in pain as the weight increases on your body until finally..... pop

Jack notices a small pop under his foot. He lifts it to see a red blotch on it.

"Damn bugs getting inside" he says as he continues to walk into the bathroom
1141.title: Jack unknowingly crushes you

info.brief_description: While at a big family get together at a lakehouse, somehow shrink down to 2 inches tall
info.description:
Death is allowed.
More than one person can shrink
Anything goes
info.pretty_title: Shrunk at a family get together
